name: Take Billie Home
description:
Billie is locked up in a cell. Follow the instructions to attempt getting free but you will be deceived by the game. Keep on swimming and you will find a way out. A hint will be added once you are tricked. Make sure to give it another try to fully experience this casual adventure with alternate endings.

Take Billie Home is a mini-adventure game built for PC and made for the 1 week Community Game Jam. Use the arrows, WASD or a joystick to move. Enter or Return keys to start playing or restart the level.
